formula: a(n)=sum(k=1..2*n, ((-1)*sum(t=0..n-k, binomial(2*n,2*t+k)*((sum(j=k..2*n-2*t-k, binomial(j-1,k-1)*j!*stirling2(2*n-2*t-k,j)*(-1)^(n+j)*2^(-2*t+2*n-2*k-j+1)))*sum(i=0..k/2, (2*i-k)^(2*t+k)*binomial(k,i)*(-1)^(i)))))/(k)). - _Vladimir Kruchinin_, Jun 30 2011a(n) ~ (2*n)! * (-1)^(n+1) / (n * (log((1 + sqrt(5) + sqrt(2*(1 + sqrt(5)))) / 2))^(2*n)). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jan 24 2015
mathematica: nn = 20; Table[(CoefficientList[Series[Log[1 + Sin[x]*Tan[x]], {x, 0, 2*nn}], x] * Range[0, 2*nn]!)[[n]], {n, 1, 2*nn+1, 2}] (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jan 24 2015 *)
author: _R. H. Hardin_
